mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn, a.* from (select postNo, parent_postNo, postTitle, postDate, userId, level, postStatus from (select * from zzz_post where boardNo = #{boardNo} order by postNo desc) a start with parent_postNo is null connect by prior postNo = parent_postNo order siblings by groupNo desc, postNO) a ) where rn between (#{page}-1)*#{pagesize} + 1 and #{page}*#{pagesize}
